question: 博物館
sourceMnemonic: An <kanji>exhibition</kanji> for <kanji>thing</kanji>s is put in a <kanji>public building</kanji> for anyone to see. This place is a <vocabulary>museum</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
